replace.sel: /aiscript/attention[@min='unknown']/actions/do_if[@value='$homebase.isoperational and not $homebase.isclass.ship']/do_if[@value='not $tradeforbuildstorage']/do_all[@exact='$table_insufficient.keys.count'][@counter='$i'][1]/do_if[@value='not $resources_shortage.indexof.{$locware} and $resources.indexof.{$locware} and (this.assignedcontrolled.cargo.{$locware}.max gt 0)']/do_if[@value='$homebase.cargo.{$locware}.count lt ($homebase.cargo.{$locware}.target * 0.9)']/@value

/aiscript/attention[@min='unknown']/actions/do_if[@value='$homebase.isoperational and not $homebase.isclass.ship']/do_if[@value='not $tradeforbuildstorage']/do_all[@exact='$table_shortage.keys.count'][@counter='$i'][1]/do_if[@value='not $resources_shortage.indexof.{$locware} and $resources.indexof.{$locware} and (this.assignedcontrolled.cargo.{$locware}.max gt 0)']/do_if[@value='$homebase.cargo.{$locware}.count lt ($homebase.cargo.{$locware}.target * 0.9)']/@value

/aiscript/attention[@min='unknown']/actions/do_if[@value='$homebase.isoperational and not $homebase.isclass.ship']/do_if[@value='not $tradeforbuildstorage']/do_all[@exact='$table_insufficient.keys.count'][@counter='$i'][3]/do_if[@value='not $resources_shortage.indexof.{$locware} and $resources.indexof.{$locware} and (this.assignedcontrolled.cargo.{$locware}.max gt 0)']/do_if[@value='$homebase.cargo.{$locware}.count lt ($homebase.cargo.{$locware}.target * 0.9)']/@value

/aiscript/attention[@min='unknown']/actions/do_if[@value='$homebase.isoperational and not $homebase.isclass.ship']/do_if[@value='not $tradeforbuildstorage']/do_all[@exact='$table_shortage.keys.count'][@counter='$i'][3]/do_if[@value='not $resources_shortage.indexof.{$locware} and $resources.indexof.{$locware} and (this.assignedcontrolled.cargo.{$locware}.max gt 0)']/do_if[@value='$homebase.cargo.{$locware}.count lt ($homebase.cargo.{$locware}.target * 0.9)']/@value
